response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Sum of Square Numbers\", \"description\": \"Write a function `max_sum_of_squares` that takes an integer array as input and returns the maximum sum of square numbers that can be obtained by selecting some (not necessarily distinct) elements from the given array.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_of_squares(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of square numbers that can be obtained by selecting some elements from the given array.\\n\", \"code\": \"\\ndef max_sum_of_squares(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    arr.sort()\\n    n = len(arr)\\n    if n % 2 == 0:\\n        mid = n // 2\\n        return sum(i ** 2 for i in arr[:mid])\\n    else:\\n        return (arr[n // 2] ** 2) + sum(i ** 2 for i in arr[:n // 2])\\n\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_of_squares([1, 3, 5]) == 9\", \"assert max_sum_of_squares([-1, 0, 1, 2, 3]) == 4\", \"assert max_sum_of_squares([10, 15, 20, 25]) == 625\", \"assert max_sum_of_squares([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) == 9\"] }"
